How do I get Oil Fire/Flame for my Kato?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Techs/Tech Chains: How do I get Oil Fire/Flame for my Kato?
By Masamune on Monday, June 18, 2001 - 01:58 pm:

I've tried to get Oil Fire for 3 of my katos that iv'e raised. But I can never seem to get it.
Have any of you had this problem.
And if you had do you know the answer?

By Dark Phoenix on Monday, July 9, 2001 - 04:21 pm:

Richard Ryley has been testing how to get these moves. According to him, the moves are impossible to get due to a bug.
